title: [K-12] Personalized Adaptive Science Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: An environment where students conduct science projects on personal devices, experiencing real-time feedback and personalized learning pathways

learning_goals: Students can complete science project topics at 80% or higher by adapting to individual learning paces using an adaptive hypermedia system
Students can analyze system-provided data to identify at least three learning patterns and develop improvement plans
Through team-based PBL activities, students can understand peers' learning path differences and propose at least two collaboration strategies

resources: IMS LD Standard-Compliant Learning Management System

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
